passages.text:
Wiggly::Ah!  You're back again.

Wiggly,surprised::Is your toe feeling any better now that you've put a splint around it?

Amelie::Not really.  It doesn't really look like a toe anymore.

Amelie::But, for once, everything else is alright.

Amelie::For the first time, I feel like I'm myself.  No one else is pulling the strings.

Wiggly,laughing::I'm glad to hear that.  

Wiggly::So, do you still feel like going deeper into the city?

Amelie::No.  I got what I came here for.

Amelie,sad::I'm honestly a little disappointed.  It looks more beautiful than I remember.  From here, at least.

Amelie::But I think it's best we leave it be.

Wiggly,looking_to_side::Ah.  I see.

Wiggly::I guess you found her, huh...

Amelie,guilty::Yes.  She was wrapped up in one of the beds, down there.  I couldn't even see her face.  But I knew who it was.

Amelie,guilty::I got what I needed from her.

Amelie,guilty::And, well, I found something else down there, too.

[[C->amelie turns to wiggly]]
passages.name: amelie reappears

passages.text:
Amelie::You should feel upset.  And angry.  And hurt.  It's fine to feel that way.

Amelie::They took a lot away from you.

Wiggly,sad::...

Amelie::Just don't do what I did.

Amelie::Move on, and don't let it ruin the life you have left.

[[C->wiggly turns again]]
passages.name: part 2

passages.text:
Amelie::...

Giant Rat::This view, it fills me with such life.  Tears are flooding my eyesockets.

Amelie::Oh, hey.  I honestly forgot I still had you with me.

Giant Rat::I've been trying to conserve the life I've been given.

Giant Rat::But this, it makes me swell.

Giant Rat::I am being called home, this I can feel.

Giant Rat::Amelie, I need you to throw me, as far as you can.

Giant Rat::I have just this tiny sliver of life left to give the world.  I must give it all back before I leave.

Amelie::You want me to toss you off the roof and towards the Core?

Giant Rat::Yes.  From there I can make it to the river.  The current will take me where I need to go.

Amelie::You seem so gung-ho, so thrilled just to exist...

Amelie::Kids from the basement beat you to death, right?  How can you live without resenting what they did to you?

Giant Rat::Some animate bits of organic matter were cruel to me.  I harbor no resentment over it.

Giant Rat::Do you resent lightning for striking you?

Amelie::You ate your own babies!  Do you not feel guilty or upset about that, at least?

Giant Rat::I shouldn't have eaten my babies.  But I can't undo it.  Rats cannot travel through time.

Giant Rat::But I know how to live now.  Every moment I live in harmony, I do right by them.

Giant Rat::In a few hours this body and mind will die again.  But I will never be dead.  Every moment I have, I am alive.

Giant Rat::I'm not going to waste that.

Amelie::...

Amelie::Alright.  Let's do this.

[[C->rear back]]
passages.name: amelie alone

passages.text:
Amelie::...

Amelie::I guess, now I can try just being alone.
passages.name: left alone

passages.text:
Amelie::Something you should see.

[[C->wiggly also turns]]
passages.name: amelie turns to wiggly

passages.text:
Wiggly,skeptical::W...What's this?

Wiggly::That's my name on the paper.

Amelie,guilty::It's a certificate stating that you were stillborn.  

Amelie::Issued to your parents.

Amelie::You weren't really an orphan, Paul.

Amelie::You, and a lot of other kids, were stolen and trafficked.  Probably by Rosalind, and this other doctor named Tann.

[[C->wiggly turns forward again]]
passages.name: wiggly also turns

passages.text:
Wiggly::...

Wiggly::.....

Wiggly,neutral::.......

Wiggly::I...don't really know how to feel, about that.

[[C->part 2]]
passages.name: wiggly turns forward again

passages.text:
Wiggly::Can I...have an hour or so?  Alone?  Just...Wait here.  

Wiggly::You'll be safe, if you wait here.

Wiggly::I understand this is a somewhat unprofessional request, but I just need a bit of time to myself.

[[C->wiggly faces city again]]
passages.name: wiggly turns again

passages.text:
Wiggly::This is...difficult for me to understand.

Amelie::You have no practice standing up for yourself, do you?

Amelie::Take all the time you need.  I'm not going anywhere.

Amelie::But...where are you going to go?  I'm just curious.

Wiggly::I have a room down in the boilers where I like to cry and smash bottles some times.

Wiggly::I call it my sad place.  It's got lots of weird pipes and vents that are fun to crawl through.

Wiggly::Usually it cheers me up, but this time I don't know.

Amelie::Uhm.  Yeah, sure.  Go run around down there all you need to.

Amelie::I think I'll just wait right here.  I enjoy the view.

Wiggly::Thanks.  I'll be back, before the skylights shut off.

[[C->Wiggly leaves]]
passages.name: wiggly faces city again
